posts.post_content:
Good Afternoon All,

For sale is a Thaddeus Wilkerson RPPC of hilltop park. This specimen presents much better than the example I just sold via LOTG auctions. Please see scans.

Looking for $1,100 (Insured and delivered) OBO. "I'll take it" supersedes ongoing negotiations. Please PM me with offers. PayPal (regular or F&F), Money orders, personal checks (held until cleared). Prefer US buyers, but will consider shipping to Canada.
David Nice pickup glad you have interest in the early Junior circuit New York team as well as your Beloved Giants..
